thread.title: They Found A Replacement For Beyoncé At Coachella! See Who It Is!
thread.title_full: They Found A Replacement For Beyoncé At Coachella! See Who It Is! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: They Found A Replacement For Beyoncé At Coachella! See Who It Is!
text:
Praise Beysus!!
After finding out on February 23 that Beyoncé would not be performing at Coachella this year, we were sorely disappointed.
Related: Jeopardy! 's Alex Trebek Is Sort Of A Rapper Now 
Luckily, a replacement has been found, and according to Billboard , it's… Lady GaGa !
Billboard 's source says GaGa will fill in for Queen Bey on both Saturday nights (April 15, 22).
Apparently festival organizers Goldenvoice and AEG Live are working now to finalize everything, with plans to make the official announcement this week.
So, will U be keeping your tickets now or nah?? 
Tags: beyonce , coachella , lady gaga , music minute
